scripts.avatarBuildDev: cross-env VITE_PROJECT=avatar vite build --mode devAvatar && cross-env VITE_PROJECT=avatar vite preview --mode devAvatar
scripts.avatarBuildPro: cross-env VITE_PROJECT=avatar vite build --mode proAvatar && cross-env VITE_PROJECT=avatar vite preview --mode proAvatar
scripts.hispitoryBuildDev: cross-env VITE_PROJECT=hispitory vite build --mode devHispitory && cross-env VITE_PROJECT=hispitory vite preview --mode devHispitory
scripts.hispitoryBuildPro: cross-env VITE_PROJECT=hispitory vite build --mode proHispitory && cross-env VITE_PROJECT=hispitory vite preview --mode proHispitory
scripts.r: rimraf cache && rimraf dist && rimraf package-lock.json rimraf stats.html && rimraf node_modules && echo 已删除依赖文件，【npm i】重新安装
